snippet.title: Grim - Official Trailer | Upload VR Showcase Winter 2023
snippet.description: Explore a desolate planet and get ready to fight to live in this trailer for Grim, an upcoming multiplayer survival game. In Grim, you must immerse yourself in harsh landscapes, where survival is not just a choice but a grueling battle against nature and other desperate players. You must gather resources, craft, and build your base, all to stay alive. Grim will be available on Steam and Meta.
